mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoMtmInqAtchFile Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MTM_INQ_SN , MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE_TURN , MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE_NM , MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE_URL , MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MTM_INQ_SN = #{mtmInqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND MTM_INQ_ATCH_FILE_TURN = #{mtmInqAtchFileTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
